body.name: Ben Sherman Nottingham Lightweight Hardside 4-Wheel Spinner Travel Luggage, Charcoal, 3-Piece Set (20"/24"/28")
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 8 hrs 6 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 21 hrs 36 mins
features: Durable, hardside ABS exteriors with molded corner guard reinforcements and tear-resistant, fully lined interiors.
Main compartment interiors feature several zippered organization pockets and garment restraint panels.
Flexible top, bottom, and side grab handles allow for easy lifting.
Retractable telescoping trolley handles extend 41 inches.
20" luggage meets most U. S based & international airline carry-on size requirements and fits into most overhead bins.
body.description: Pack your travel essentials with ease in the 3-piece (20-inch, 24-inch, & 28-inch) lightweight, hardside, 4-wheel spinner luggage set from Ben Sherman’s “Nottingham” luggage collection. This 3-piece luggage set includes a 20-inch carry-on suitcase, a 24-inch checked size suitcase, and a larger 28-inch checked size suitcase. Each piece is loaded with features including a fully-lined, spacious interior, a large U-shaped pocket that allows for double-sided packing, a bottom grab handle, and flexible top and side grab handles that allow for easy lifting and manuevering. Each luggage upright also includes multi-directional, 4-wheel spinners that allow for smooth 360° degree movement over any rough terrain for complete mobility free-weight rolling. The fully-lined interior main compartment features a zipper accessory pocket and a garment restraint zipper panel that helps to hold your clothes and contents in place. Interior of main compartment also includes a U-shaped mesh zipper pocket and a side zipper pocket for smaller items. Each luggage upright features a sturdy locking retractable push-button telescopic trolley handle that extends 41 inches, which is conducive to simple, one-handed use. An essential and dependable lightweight, hardside luggage set for travelers whom value both function and style. 20" Carry-On Dimensions: 22. 0" H x 14. 5" L x 10. 0" D. 24" Overall Dimensions: 27. 0” H x 17. 5” L x 11. 0” D. 28" Overall Dimensions: 30. 0” H x 21. 0” L x 12. 5” D. All dimensions include wheels and handles. Individual Weights: 20": 6. 65 lbs / 24": 8. 9 lbs / 28": 10. 35 lbs. Set Weight: 25. 9 lbs. Backed by a manufacturer 10-year limited . Whether you are heading to the office or to the airport, when you venture out with a bag from Ben Sherman, we want you to embark on your journey with confidence and peace of mind. This is why we are keen to even the smallest of details while putting emphasis on fashion, functionality, quality and durability above all else.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ben Sherman Ben Sherman’s story is carved into British clothing history. It aims to be not only a place to buy modern and relevant products steeped in history, but a place to interact, be informed, and be inspired.

Ben Sherman "Nottingham" Luggage Collection An essential hardside luggage set for travelers who value both style and function. Pack your travel essentials easily with this lightweight hardside luggage set from Ben Sherman’s “Nottingham” collection. Including hardside upright spinner suitcases that are either 20”, 24”, or 28” tall. Each piece is loaded with features including a fully lined spacious interior, a large U-shaped pocket allowing for double-sided packing, a bottom grab handle, and flexible top and side grab handles for easy lifting. Multi-directional 4-wheel spinners help you get where you’re going faster, providing a smooth 360-degree rotation over any rough surface. The perfect dependable suitcase for modern travelers. 20” Spinner - 22.0” H x 14.5” W x 10.0” D, 6.65 lbs24” Spinner - 27.0” H X 17.5” W x 11.0” D, 8.9 lbs28” Spinner - 30.0” H x 21.0” W x 12.5" D, 10.35 lbs
Features Summary Molded corner guard reinforcementsRetractable telescopic trolley handleTop and side handlesGarment restraint straps4-wheel spinners for 360 degree movement

Feature Details Materials Protective hard shell caseDurable, high-strength hardside ABS exteriorLightweight construction helps you adhere to airline weight restrictions and avoid unneeded airport feesSelf-repairing coil zippers for long-lasting use Multi-Directional 4-Wheel Spinners Multi-directional 4-wheel spinner wheels allow smooth, 360° degree movement over any rough terrain for complete mobility and free-weight rolling.Spinner wheels relieve any pressure from your arms while on the move. Spacious Compartment Interior Both interior compartments feature a large U-shaped zipper pocket meant to hold your clothes and contents in place.Tear-resistant, fully lined interior.Interior of main compartment includes a U-shaped mesh zipper pocket and a side zipper pocket for smaller items. Exterior Sturdy locking retractable push-button telescopic trolley handle extends 41 inches and is conductive for simple, one-handed use.Four molded corner guard reinforcements which provides optimum impact resistance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Epic roller bag for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love Ben Sherman products, this one didn’t disappoint. Amazing value for the price, great quality, stylish. Perfect amount of room with zippered pockets to separate everything. Nice, smooth, rolling wheels, sturdy handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product. It's roomy and lightweight. It was a present for my mom and she loves it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handled well on trip
reviews.reviewText: It made it to and from Vegas with no problem. Great buy and moved smoothly. One of the inserts did rip but I had put my heel up when zipped but still great but.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I had no problem with it and love the color. The handle is light and felt like it won’t last long. Aluminum? I expected for what I paid the handle to feel more sturdy than it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not have a TSA-approved lock nor elasticized tie-down straps
reviews.reviewText: Appears fine but, contrary to statements in one video, does not have a TSA-approved lock nor elasticized tie-down straps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very happy with this luggage, it rolls nicely, is a great size, seems durable and it’s stylish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, just what I wanted

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This bag is awful. Between my girlfriend and I we both 3 of these checked bags. The handle completely broke after 6 months, where I cant even properly shut the handle. The zipper also has broken where you cant even properly close it. Luckily I was able to get these fixed for a pretty penny but I would look somewhere else for a bag.

Ben Sherman luggage is typically a step above standard, this Nottingham edition is no exception.Easy rolling and spinning, sturdy construction with reinforced corners.My favorite feature is the full zip garment compartments on BOTH SIDES of the interior eliminating the elastic X on one side. Brilliant and secure.

Looks as advertised & lots of room.Moves around great, but havent used it nough yet to comment on durability. As for the one colour issue I just bought a suitcase cover, I know some people use stickers or ribbons. Cuz it’s hard to distinguish it being your bag & not someone elses.
I love the look of this suitcase. It is the perfect size for travel.

reviews.reviewTitle: The best on the market. On board perfect when customs open your suitcase
reviews.reviewText: If you travel a lot these are perfect. Why because custom agents when they open your suitcase, they don't really pay attention if something fall off. These suitcases have a closing zipper on both sides. If you travel with a lot of small items, it is what you need. They are very sturdy, extremely light empty, easy to handle when completely full. We travel everywhere and they are simply perfect. Would not go anywhere without them. Comes in 3 sizes. The 20 inch is perfect for onboard.
